title: tisnaislam111ALT
author: tisnaislam111ALT
created_time: March 20, 2023, 12:44:43 AMLast edit: March 20, 2023, 06:22:09 AM by tisnaislam111ALT
content: Dear Bitcoin forum,Im tisnaislam111 from Bangladesh. I joined bitcoin talk on July 13, 2022.  I made a post on our local thread on March 20th. That post is 80% similar to another brother's post.  He reports to me.  Then my account got banned..  He reports to me.  Then my account was banned.  Please give me another chance.  I vowed not to make this mistake in the future.  Give me another chance.My banned profile link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3492758Thank you Bitcoin forum in advance,as I patiently wait for your response and actions.Cheers and have a great day.Respectfully Yours,tisnaislam111ALT

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: tisnaislam111ALT on March 20, 2023, 12:44:43 AMThat post is 80% identical to another brother from earlier.  He reports to me.  Then my account was banned.  Sad to see that you did not admit, it was plagiarism. You technically wanted to avoid it by saying it's 80% identical LOL.How can a post be 80% identical with someone else?QuoteI vowed not to make this mistake in the future.  Give me another chance.I doubt. You will do the same again because you even don't realize how bad is plagiarism. On a side discussion, it's only a member rank profile. Do you really think it worth anything?

comments.author: tisnaislam111ALT
comments.created_time: March 20, 2023, 06:06:26 AMLast edit: March 20, 2023, 06:23:07 AM by tisnaislam111ALT
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on March 20, 2023, 01:33:31 AMQuote from: tisnaislam111ALT on March 20, 2023, 12:44:43 AMThat post is 80% identical to another brother from earlier.  He reports to me.  Then my account was banned.  Sad to see that you did not admit, it was plagiarism. You technically wanted to avoid it by saying it's 80% identical LOL.How can a post be 80% identical with someone else?Soory  That post is 80% similar to another brother's post.  He reports to me.  Then my account got banned.I was sharing a raffle in our local thread.  The post type was the same.  I was sharing the raffle number 506.  And that brother shared the number 505 Raffle. I have given the screenshots of the two posts. This is my post: https://res.cloudinary.com/dcvvwskjo/image/upload/v1679291444/Screenshot_20230320-114738_wonxyf.png Here is his post: https://res.cloudinary.com/dcvvwskjo/image/upload/v1679291444/Screenshot_20230320-114851_iaqusk.pngSee both posts.  I was just sharing the raffle.  Please forgive me if there are any mistakes here.  Give me one more chance.  I promise I will think about any post in the future.

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: tisnaislam111ALT on March 20, 2023, 06:06:26 AMPlease forgive me if there are any mistakes here.  Give me one more chance.  I promise I will think about any post in the future.The only ones who gonna help you here is theymos and Cyrus. Try contacting them through PM and explain the situation, although chances are slim. Btw, was it your first plagiarism or you got multiple warnings anytime before that ? Just curious. You won't have any chance if you were warned before.

comments.author: tisnaislam111ALT
comments.body: Quote from: Edwardard on March 20, 2023, 06:27:37 AMQuote from: tisnaislam111ALT on March 20, 2023, 06:06:26 AMPlease forgive me if there are any mistakes here.  Give me one more chance.  I promise I will think about any post in the future.The only ones who gonna help you here is theymos and Cyrus. Try contacting them through PM and explain the situation, although chances are slim. Btw, was it your first plagiarism or you got multiple warnings anytime before that ? Just curious. You won't have any chance if you were warned before.This is the first.  I didn't get any warnings before.  Please let me know if there is any way to contact them.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Quote from: tisnaislam111ALT on March 20, 2023, 06:49:13 AMThis is the first.  I didn't get any warnings before.  Please let me know if there is any way to contact them.This is their account, you can directly write a message to them.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=pm;sa=send;u=35https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=pm;sa=send;u=78147I'm not sure res.cloudinary.com is actually legit, so I wouldn't dare to click your link. But since it's a plagiarism and you're saying your post 80% identical to someone, the moderators doesn't wrong to ban you. Even you're copy pasting one liner post, you still have a chance getting banned.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: tisnaislam111ALT on March 20, 2023, 06:06:26 AM I have given the screenshots of the two posts. This is my post: https://res.cloudinary.com/dcvvwskjo/image/upload/v1679291444/Screenshot_20230320-114738_wonxyf.png Here is his post: https://res.cloudinary.com/dcvvwskjo/image/upload/v1679291444/Screenshot_20230320-114851_iaqusk.pngSee both posts.  I was just sharing the raffle.  Please forgive me if there are any mistakes here.  Give me one more chance.  I promise I will think about any post in the future.The screenshots do not show the post ID, do you have the IDs of the posts. It looks like you quoted the post from Shasan but it's hard to find the contents on the 2nd image. If you know the ID of both posts then may be ninjastic.space can help.But I don't think mods banned you without looking at closely. You must did something else that looked like a full plagiarism.

comments.author: hosemary
comments.created_time: March 20, 2023, 07:50:39 AMLast edit: March 20, 2023, 08:14:16 AM by hosseinimr93

You must did something else that looked like a full plagiarism. I don't understand Bengali and I used google-translator for checking the posts. It seems that tisnaislam111 copy-pasted shasan's post and just changed two dates and a number.

comments.author: tisnaislam111ALT
comments.body: I have translated both posts into Englishshasan post: krogothmanhattan came up with the 505th free raffle. Where anyone who has an account before 31st January can apply. The only condition is that the account must be on or before 31st January. So those who want to apply should apply immediately.my post: krogothmanhattan came up with the 506th free raffle. Where anyone who has an account before February 1 can apply. The only condition is that the account must be registered before 1 February or 1 February. So those who want to apply should apply immediately.The main changes here are date and number. And what else to write such a post. I have copied and posted his very valuable writing. Why don't you try to understand. I'm sharing a raffle so everyone can join. But the writing has been matched by someone else. By doing this, I have done something like banning a profile. Everyone comes to this place with a hope. I can't succeed this time. But I learned a lot from here. Thank you all

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: May I ask if you use ChatGPT to write your posts?There are several posts that, when checked, come up with the conclusion that the post was written by AI.Did you know that copying and pasting such messages from a robot can also be considered plagiarism?Are all these posts written by you?https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5445086.msg61921345#msg61921345https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5444885.msg61911751#msg61911751

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: This is plagiarism without any doubt but OP was sharing a link to a raffle where OP has only changed the date and raffle no. I have seen a few people use the exact approach of LoyceV in the service section. Few lines are very much similar. To mod/admin who has handled the report, I don't think OP has any intention of doing something as the typical plagiarist does here. So, this can be an exception if mod/admin considers it again.Quote from: hosseinimr93 on March 20, 2023, 07:50:39 AMI don't understand Bengali and I used google-translator for checking the posts. It seems that tisnaislam111 copy-pasted shasan's post and just changed two dates and a number. You are correct, OP only changed the date and raffle number from shasan's post.Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on March 20, 2023, 10:03:09 AMMay I ask if you use ChatGPT to write your posts?OP has copied from shasan.

comments.author: bettercrypto
comments.body: Quote from: tisnaislam111ALT on March 20, 2023, 12:44:43 AMDear Bitcoin forum,Im tisnaislam111 from Bangladesh. I joined bitcoin talk on July 13, 2022.  I made a post on our local thread on March 20th. That post is 80% similar to another brother's post.  He reports to me.  Then my account got banned..  He reports to me.  Then my account was banned.  Please give me another chance.  I vowed not to make this mistake in the future.  Give me another chance.My banned profile link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3492758Thank you Bitcoin forum in advance,as I patiently wait for your response and actions.Cheers and have a great day.Respectfully Yours,tisnaislam111ALTIf you talk about plagiarism as the issue of banning your account, it can be said that it is a serious offense, the chances of your account being revoked from banning are very small.      But like others have said here, there is nothing to lose if you personally send a message to theymos here on the forum, just pray that you get noticed. Just be careful about what you post next time.

comments.author: tisnaislam111ALT
comments.body: Can I get my ID back?  What else do I need to do?  Please someone tell me something.

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Quote from: tisnaislam111ALT on March 20, 2023, 12:44:43 AMI made a post on our local thread on March 20th. That post is 80% similar to another brother's post.  He reports to me.  Then my account got bannedI don't know if it's an act if negligence or laziness that is common to some members of this community most especially the newbies not to have taken the law stated on the rules and regulations if the forum that plagiarism attract permanent ban, now when the ban arrives they began to make excuses upon excuse, some don't take it serious not until they tasted been banned, why was it that it was after your ban you discovered what you did or have been doing was wrong.

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Quote from: tisnaislam111ALT on March 21, 2023, 10:29:38 AMCan I get my ID back?  What else do I need to do?  Please someone tell me something.You didn't post the link to the post you feel caused your ban which makes it a little bit difficult for me to access. But did you receive an email from any moderator informing you about your ban and the reason for it? I have seen some threads like this where a moderator will suddenly come online and state the real cause of your ban and direct you on the next action to take. I think you should be patient and wait if any of them will show up. From your expression, I can feel that the account means a lot to you. I wish you the best of luck.

comments.author: tisnaislam111ALT
comments.body: I am patient and hope to get my account back.  Thank you for giving me some courage.
